title: Love Struck
description: In a fit of rage, Angel mistakenly tells her parents to grow up, and before she knows it, they're zapped back to their teens and running away together because they're so in love. Now Angel's got the weight of the world on her shoulders. Lou Cipher was finally dropping his evil ways, but since he's back to his teen self, who knows how he'll choose to use his special powers?
author: Shani Petroff
